name: MotivationalInspiration
0:
”Alexa, open motivational inspiration”
”Alexa, start motivational inspiration”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivational inspiration
des: You can start your day with Alexa reading you a daily quote or basically anytime of the day. Get this skill now and say "Alexa, open motivational inspiration" to receive your quote of inspiration and get your rush of happiness. You can also make it a part of your routine in the morning or the night. New quotes are being added daily :)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
